{{Wireless embedded system |brand=IOGear |model=GWA502 |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=03/25/2004 |manuf_country= |manuf=Microlink |manuf_model=MWL-21G3 |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=QVZ20200000 |ic_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Intersil |cpu1_model=ISL3893 |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=2 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29LV160ATTC-90 |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=8 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=HY57V641620HG |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip1_model=ISL3893 |wi1_chip2_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip2_model=ISL3686A |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=IC+ |sw_model=IP175A |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=Wireless-G |default_ssid_regex=^Wireless-G$ |default_ip=192.168.62.10 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=00:0C:55 |oui_eth=00:0C:55 |default_ch= }} ''Wireless-G Broadband Router''
[http://www.iogear.com/product/GWA502/ Product page]
[http://www.iogear.com/support/manual/33%20GWA502%20manual.pdf Manual] "MWL-21G4" and "Ver 02" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :The Flash chip appears to be a MX29LV160ATTC-90 (2 MB). The default SSID is presumed to be '''Wireless-G''' and the OUI is presumed to be 00:0C:55. Both are the values used in the manual and there is moderate WiGLE support. The power adapter shown in the FCC photos is a '''Hon-Kwang''' D12-1A (120VAC ~ 60Hz, 23W -> 12VDC, 1.0A).
